1.question: I have hands but no fingers. What am I?
I fly without wings. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I am always running but never move. What am I?
What has a neck but no head?

2.question: What has keys but can't open locks?
I shave every day, but my beard stays the same. What am I?
The more you remove, the bigger I get. What am I?
What has a mouth but never speaks?

3.question: What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?
I have cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and rivers but no water. What am I?
What has an eye but cannot see?
What has words but never speaks?
What is full of holes but still holds water?

4.question: What can fill a room but takes no space?
What has a heart but no body?
I have four fingers and a thumb but am not alive. What am I?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
The more you use me, the more you leave behind. What am I?

5.question: What has no beginning, middle, or end?
I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. What am I?
I am not alive, but I grow. What am I?
What begins and has no end, yet is always new?
I go up but never come down. What am I?

bonus.question: I am taken from a mine and shut inside a wooden case. I am used by many but seen by few. What am I?
I can travel the world while staying in the same place. What am I?
The more you feed me, the bigger I get. What am I?
I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter but not go outside. What am I?
I am always hungry, I must be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?
